This R Markdown for hw3 reinforces skills from Data Visualization and Exploratory Data Analysis

### Setup

Load packages and set chunk options

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(patchwork)

knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  warning = FALSE, 
  message = FALSE, 
  fig.width = 6,
  fig.asp = .6,
  out.width = "90%"
)
```
